title: Pires (António Augusto da Silva)
body: He was appointed Civil Governor of the Funchal district by decree of June 9, 1921, taking office on the 19th. He left for Lisbon on July 18 of the same year.

Funchal: District where he was appointed Civil Governor

António Augusto da Silva Pires: Appointed Civil Governor of the Funchal district

1921: Appointment as Civil Governor of the Funchal district
